entry.title: Bitcoin Testing Project
entry.summary: In this context, the author expresses his admiration for someone who is working on a different area of the Bitcoin ecosystem. He wishes to encourage the person who has asked for help or reviews in their processes. The author himself is unable to help due to being preoccupied with his own work. They exchange some light-hearted banter and the author ultimately provides encouragement for more testing. The email thread includes a promotional message for a Live Security Virtual Conference covering endpoint security, mobile security, and malware threats. It also includes information about the Bitcoin-development mailing list.
